card.card: {"item":{"at_control":"","category":"daily","description":"#石动双叶#短发，矮小，和装，打戏……你未必需要打破标签，但一定可以把它们内化为只属于自己的力量。\n你未必也要去征服世界，但只要继续走在成长途中，视野一定就会更加宽广。\n生日快乐，石动双叶！ ​​​","id":69264337,"is_fav":0,"pictures":[{"img_height":1080,"img_size":356.43,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/0ba9ebe12308309cef03f22bc87e6fc9d8366a5e.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1920},{"img_height":828,"img_size":186.4,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/b0fdee88f3bd342a1f8b4afb18dc5ea0888649ce.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1792},{"img_height":1080,"img_size":346.36,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/ad1b74abfb0afc5be5470ef8d86e175e17920add.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1920},{"img_height":852,"img_size":196.57,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/d6f9d8d1fa6b9e11e502be397310a3bebf5eb9f7.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1136},{"img_height":1080,"img_size":253.02,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/c9b0648dbfd9ec9815f657720c07e517a3fd4ed5.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1920},{"img_height":1080,"img_size":315.11,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/06e522985f5ecae9c84a6804f5b413a03a234524.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1920}],"pictures_count":6,"reply":86,"role":[],"settings":{"copy_forbidden":"0"},"source":[],"title":"","upload_time":1587053092},"user":{"head_url":"https:\/\/i1.hdslb.com\/bfs\/face\/7626da8b83eb3872860f9f9c7496a8f800c480b1.jpg","name":"圣翔音乐学院放送科","uid":234441166,"vip":{"avatar_subscript":0,"due_date":1579017600000,"label":{"label_theme":"","path":"","text":""},"nickname_color":"","status":0,"theme_type":0,"type":1,"vip_pay_type":0}}}
